mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberAge, memberPhone) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberPhone})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberId = #{memberId} and memberPassword = #{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberPhone=#{memberPhone} where m_id=#{m_id}
